headline: How Mastercard’s Blockchain And Open Banking Pivot Amid Fee Pressure At Mastercard (MA) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In recent weeks, Mastercard has been at the center of multiple developments, from potential investments in digital asset firm Zerohash to new product launches, open banking collaborations and evolving merchant fee settlements, all unfolding against a backdrop of proposed credit card regulation in major markets. Together, these moves highlight how Mastercard is trying to balance regulatory pressure on its fee model with growth initiatives in blockchain infrastructure, AI-enhanced services and...
